nodes.text: Star Wars: Droid Repair Bay is a canon virtual reality experience created by ILMxLAB for the HTC Vive and Samsung Gear platforms.
The experience focuses on repairing droids aboard General Leia Organa's ship. It takes place during the events of Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, and introduced several new astromech droids.
The game's ending sees the First Order fleet lead by the Supremacy attack the Raddus while rebel pilots including Poe Dameron run down the adjacent corridor as seen in Star Wars: The Last Jedi.

In Star Wars: The Last Jedi: Incredible Cross Sections, writer Jason Fry and the Lucasfilm Story Group highlighted the location of the droid repair bay on the Raddus in which the experience takes place.
